data.name: lbldefault_01
data.value:
The PERMATApintar Emotional Quotient Test. is an assessment feedback process to assess the competence of the assessee on a number of core competencies. This assessment is to be based on your own personal experience with the assessee. Please provide your honest assessment and do not discuss your assessment with others or seek the view of others on the assessment you should give.

The statements below are the behavioral descriptors of the core competencies to be assessed. Please use the scale below to provide your assessment. If you feel you cannot provide an assessment on any of the following behaviours, just choose the response “0”. The assessment you provide will be treated as confidential.

data.name: lblFeedback

data.name: lblQ021_0
data.value: Setiap foto dibawah menggambarkan emosi tertentu. Tanpa mengambilkira jatina, gambarkan individu yang anda nilai adalah individu dalam foto tersebut. Gambarkan individu tersebut berada dalam pelbagai situasi yang melahirkan beberapa ekspresi wajah dan gambaran emosi yang boleh anda ingat apabila anda berinteraksi dengannya. Nyatakan tahap emosi beliau bagi setiap jenis ekspresi emosi dengan memilih butang radio yang disediakan. Setiap nombor menggambarkan tahap keamatan bagi emosi yang anda dapat perhatikan terhadap individu yang anda nilai.

data.name: lblMsgsubmit
data.value: Once you submit your assessment, you may not make any further changes.

data.name: lblThankheaderC
data.value: Thank you for completing the PERMATApintar Emotional Quotient Test.

data.name: lblThankcontentC
data.value: The results will create a self-portrait of your leadership to guide you in your next steps towards fully developing as a leader. The PERMATApintar Emotional Quotient Test. Report will be forwarded to you and a one to one session will be arranged to walkthrough the results with you. During the one to one session, you will be able to discuss the insights from the assessment results in detail and structure a development plan for moving forward.

data.name: lblThankheaderR
data.value: Thank you for completing the PERMATApintar Emotional Quotient Test.

data.name: lblThankcontentR
data.value: Your contribution is highly appreciated and will contribute to the betterment of the entire organisaiton.

data.name: lblThankAssignRaterDone
data.value:
Thank you for nominating your assessors. An email notification will be sent to all your assessors to complete the assessment.

You will also receive an email with a link for you to complete your self assessment.

data.value: Thank you.

data.name: lblSaveExitAssignRater
data.value: Thank you for your progress in completing the assessor nomination. Your selections have been saved. To re-visit the assessor nomination page, please click on the original link emailed to you.

data.name: lblHomeOverview
data.value: Overview

data.name: lblHomeCandidate
data.value: How important do you think emotional intelligent is as compared to general intelligent in ensuring your success in life, academic work (while studying) and at work? I have conducted research in emotional intelligent in Malaysia and found that people attribute their success namely to emotional intelligent. They suggested that "you have to be able to connect to yourself, read yourself well, get to know your strengths and weaknesses, motivate yourself from within. That is the first step. Next you must know people that surround you, manage them appropriately, learn from them, understand and help them develop their potential, then look inwards towards the values in life that you hold. Will those values help you be a better person? and finally, learn from your past experiences". If this is true and you have all these, then you will be a highly successful people.

data.name: lblHomeBenefit
data.value: How will I benefit?

data.name: lblHomeBenefitContent
data.value: NA

data.name: lblHomeOverviewRater
data.value: Overview

data.name: lblHomeRater
data.value:
The PERMATApintar Emotional Quotient Test. is an assessment feedback process to assess the competence of the candidates on the Bank’s core competencies. Through this assessment, candidates have the opportunity to gather confidential feedback from those who work with them and compare it with their own perception of their capability.

As such the feedback is gathered from multiple assessors such as manager/supervisor, peers, internal customers, direct and indirect subordinates using an online survey. This assessment is to be based on the assessor’s own personal experience with the candidate. In order for the assessment to be beneficial and effective, it is very crucial for you to be completely honest with your assessment of the candidate’s capability.

The assessment provided by all the assessors will be treated as private and confidential.

data.name: lblHomeBenefitRater
data.value: How will I benefit?

data.name: lblHomeBenefitContentRater
data.value: The PERMATApintar Emotional Quotient Test. will provide you with an opportunity to contribute to the development of your managers and peers. Therefore, the entire organization stands to benefit as individuals improve.
